Description.Text: AC Hotel Rio de Janeiro Porto Maravilha is a modern 4-star superior property offering stylish accommodation in the heart of Rio de Janeiro. Highlights include a rooftop swimming pool, a gym, and a good central location close to public transport links. Santo Cristo is a commercial and residential area located in Zona Norte. It borders Centro which boasts most of the city's notable churches and museums, including the Modern Art Museum, as well as many of its most famous bars. Places of interest include Passeio PÃºblico; an 18th-century public garden, the nearby Santa Teresa neighbourhood, and the Maracana Stadium. The hotel is housed in a modern high-rise building. Facilities include a rooftop swimming pool and a gym. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Deluxe rooms are decorated in a modern style. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, telephone, mini-bar, and an en-suite bathroom. There are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
